Symbol.Script_3D:

if pokr then gosub "ram" gosub "hand" if dl_a>=0.9 then for i=0.5*dl_a/int(dl_a/0.4) to dl_a-0.4*dl_a/int(dl_a/0.4) step dl_a/(int(dl_a/0.4)) gosub "vtor" next i endif gosub "pokr" endif
